Caption: Dr. P. Subbaroyan (Minister for Transport and Communication) gives away prize Mr. Sivaram (1966 batch, Hockey Captain)? Mr. Surjit S Randhava (left of Chief Guest), Mr. Anand Singh Bawa (centre, looking downwards). PTI Mr. Srinivasan (in suit). Identification by Mr. K. Narayanan, Mr. C.V. Sahasranamam and Mr. Anand Singh Bawa.
